title: Bloomberg Markets: Heckman Says Fed Raising Is `Right Medicine'
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Heckman Says Fed Raising Is `Right Medicine'
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Dan Heckman Senior Director and Fixed-Income Strategist U.S. Bancorp Wealth Management Discussing expecting the FOMC to wait until later in the year to see if economic conditions, specifically unemployment continues it's current decline towards 4 percent, before the Committee makes its next decision to raise the Fed Funds rate.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Dan Heckman Senior Director and Fixed-Income Strategist U.S. Bancorp Wealth Management Discussing expecting the FOMC to wait until later in the year to see if economic conditions, specifically unemployment continues it's current decline towards 4 percent, before the Committee makes its next decision to raise the Fed Funds rate.
